dv

Class IntegerVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • dv.IntegerVector

  • public class IntegerVector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to encapsulate a vector of integer, stored natively.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int n
      Size of vector
      private long v
      Vector contents (C/C++ pointer cast to a long)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IntegerVector(int size)
      Create a new IntegerVector of size size with all entries set to 0.
      IntegerVector(JDDNode dd, JDDVars vars, ODDNode odd)
      Create a new IntegerVector from an existing MTBDD representation of an array.
      IntegerVector(long vector, int size)
      Create a new IntegerVector from a pointer vect to an existing native integer array of size size.

      • IntegerVector

        public IntegerVector(int size)
              throws PrismException
        Create a new IntegerVector of size size with all entries set to 0.
        Throws:
        PrismException - if there is insufficient memory to create the array.

      • IntegerVector

        public IntegerVector(long vector,
                     int size)
        Create a new IntegerVector from a pointer vect to an existing native integer array of size size.

      • IntegerVector

        public IntegerVector(JDDNode dd,
                     JDDVars vars,
                     ODDNode odd)
              throws PrismException
        Create a new IntegerVector from an existing MTBDD representation of an array.
        [ DEREFS: none ]
        Throws:
        PrismException - if number of states is too large (uses Java int based indices)
